name: Deviation of Proportions
disambiguatingDescription: Measure proposed by Gries (2008) which compares the expected distribution of a word or phrase in corpus parts with the actual distribution.
description: Measure proposed by Gries (2008) which compares the expected distribution of a word or phrase in corpus parts with the actual distribution. It is equal to the sum of the absolute values of (observed - expected proportions) divided by 2.
